M

MASTAdConstants - Class in com.MASTAdView
Manifest constants used in SDK.
MASTAdConstants() - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdConstants
 
MASTAdDelegate - Class in com.MASTAdView
The delegate class defines interfaces developers can use to extend and/or interact with feature and functions of the SDK ad handling, including: Ad download events and errors MRAID ad events Ad click events Ad window attach/expand/close events Third party ad events User notification/approval events (for picture storage or calendar creation permission)
MASTAdDelegate() - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdDelegate
 
MASTAdDelegate.AdActivityEventHandler - Interface in com.MASTAdView
Interface which supports custom callback to be invoked when ad view is attached to or detached from an activity (window), and when a banner ad view "expands" in any way (MRAID expand, resize, or interstitial display), and closes back again.
MASTAdDelegate.AdClickEventHandler - Interface in com.MASTAdView
The interface which will be invoked when loading a URL into the ad view.
MASTAdDelegate.AdDownloadEventHandler - Interface in com.MASTAdView
The interface for ad download events.
MASTAdDelegate.MraidEventHandler - Interface in com.MASTAdView
Interface for MRAID event handler, invoked when MRAID events such as resize, expand, close, etc.
MASTAdDelegate.ThirdPartyEventHandler - Interface in com.MASTAdView
Interface for third party ad requests, with an onThirdPartyEvent() method invoked when third party ad requests are being handled.
MASTAdDelegate.UserApprovalEventHandler - Interface in com.MASTAdView
Interface for handler to deal with user approval events before storing a picture or creating a calendar event.
MASTAdLog - Class in com.MASTAdView
The SDK is instrumented with log() calls to record errors, warnings and server traffic for diagnostic purposes.
MASTAdLog(View) - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdLog
Construct logging object.
MASTAdRequest - Class in com.MASTAdView
Class encapsulating all of the data and parameters associated with an ad server request.
MASTAdRequest(MASTAdLog, Context) - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdRequest
Construct an ad server request object
MASTAdView - Class in com.MASTAdView
Ad view object, acting as a container for an ad view control.
MASTAdView(Context, Integer, Integer) - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdView
Create ad view/container for displaying ads obtained through this SDK.
MASTAdView(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdView
Create ad view/container for displaying ads obtained through this SDK.
MASTAdView(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdView
Create ad view/container for displaying ads obtained through this SDK.
MASTAdView(Context) - Constructor for class com.MASTAdView.MASTAdView
Create ad view/container for displaying ads obtained through this SDK.
